title: Crash when creating new SKPath in 1.59.1
body:
Creating a new SKPath instance via SKPath() constructor is causing a crash in 1.59.1 in an iOS project. Haven't tested in Android.

Also tested 1.59.0, 1.58.1, and 1.58.0. Crash still present in 1.59.0, but not in either of the 1.58 versions.

comments.author: Mathieson
comments.body: Went back to v 1.59.1 to get output of the crash and was no longer able to repro. Not sure what the problem was, now. Closing.

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: @Mathieson There may have been an issue with the NuGets not being installed into the final app project. Or the package versions did not match.
